m_szDocTitle: METHODS SYSTEMS AND DEVICES FOR MITIGATING RISK IN DISTRIBUTED ENERGY ASSETS - KULATILAKA NALIN
m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- METHODS SYSTEMS AND DEVICES FOR MITIGATING RISK IN DISTRIBUTED ENERGY ASSETS United States Patent Application 20150371330 Kind                 Code: A1 Abstract: Devices, systems, and methods for mitigating risk in distributed energy assets are disclosed. In one aspect a computerized method comprises purchasing a bundle of distributed energy assets comprising agreements by end-users of distributed energy resources to purchase energy at variable rates which are tied to future utility rates or an index and swapping with one or more off-takers a variable stream of
